properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

Charming two-bedroom bungalow located in the serene area of Farnborough. This property features a spacious living area with large windows providing plenty of natural light, a modern kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, and a cozy fireplace. The master bedroom includes an en-suite bathroom, while the second bedroom is versatile for use as an office or guest room. Additional amenities include a private garden, off-street parking, and access to communal facilities such as a swimming pool and gym.

Spacious four-bedroom townhouse situated in the heart of Bromley. This modern property boasts an open-plan living and dining area with high ceilings and hardwood floors. The state-of-the-art kitchen comes fully fitted with the latest appliances and ample storage space. Upstairs, there are four generously sized bedrooms, including a master suite with a walk-in wardrobe and ensuite bathroom. Additional features include a private garage, landscaped garden, and a secure driveway.

Luxurious three-bedroom penthouse located on the top floor of a prestigious development in Orpington. Features include panoramic views of the surrounding area, floor-to-ceiling windows, and a private rooftop terrace perfect for entertaining. The interior is finished to the highest standard with designer fixtures, a gourmet kitchen with integrated appliances, and spacious living areas. The master bedroom offers a lavish ensuite bathroom and direct access to the terrace. Additional amenities include secure underground parking, a concierge service, and access to a fitness center.

Quaint two-bedroom cottage nestled in the picturesque village of Chelsfield. This property exudes charm with its traditional timber framing, original fireplaces, and exposed beams. The living room is warm and inviting, complemented by a modern kitchen with integrated appliances. Both bedrooms are spacious and offer ample storage space. The property benefits from a beautifully landscaped garden, a detached garage, and proximity to local amenities including shops, schools, and parks.
